title: Teddalpiaz
author: Teddalpiaz
created_time: May 10, 2023, 03:00:47 AMLast edit: May 18, 2023, 08:13:31 AM by Teddalpiaz
content: THE JOT TOKEN               JOT is a payment & governance token for the Jot Art metaverse. JOT holders will be able to claim rewards if they stake their tokens, pay for internal services in all Jot Art games, and participate in key governance votes. Players will also be able to earn 𝓙OT when they play various games within the Jot Art metaverse and through user-generated content initiatives. JOT is on TRON (TRC20).ROAD MAPTEAM

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: I've been following this project for some time now since I came across the bounty campaign. However, I have reservations about the way the OP has been writing their messages, as they seem quite sloppy. I also hope that the OP will include links to all the platforms, particularly Twitter, in this thread. Additionally, I would appreciate it if the OP could provide important updates regarding the project in a timely manner.
